title: Dreamiest, Creamiest Classic Queso
directions: Melt the butter in a sauce pan, add the cornstarch and whisk until no longer lumpy.
Add the evaporated milk to make a roux and whisk until the cornstarch is completely dissolved.
Add in the cream cheese, then the cheddar in sections, whisking until melted.
Next add the green chile, and tomatoes. Add salt and pepper to taste.
Serve with tortilla chips of choice.
ingredients: 4 oz can hatch green chiles, chopped
